channel.title: Tracking Software/Applications
channel.description: I have a Galaxy Samsung Tablet S3 and I want to have like a GPS tracker on it in case it were to be stolen or lost, does someone know where I could find this or is there another less complicated way, either one works for me?

item.title: Tracking Software/Applications
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:4, topic:535110”]https://www.google.com/android/devicemanager
It should be included with your galaxy tab 3.[/quote]
Oh wow, I didn’t know that - that fixes the phone problem which fixes both problems, thanks for the help you two.

Read full topic

item.title: Tracking Software/Applications
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

https://www.google.com/android/devicemanager
It should be included with your galaxy tab 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Tracking Software/Applications
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Flame_:

Check if your product is listed: http://www.samsung.com/uk/mobileappsandservices/find-my-mobile.html

Thanks for the link, it seems that the United States doesn’t have this feature so when I contacted them, they thought I was stupid I suppose - didn’t know that. I was able to register the tablet though through the United Kingdom domain so if it works - I don’t care (which it does). I’m working on adding my Android phone now… which isn’t working out too well.

Read full topic
